reviews.text:
Service!
This Chinese restaurant is just a few blocks from my house, and it's one of my go-to spots. Every time I call, they always answer promptly, and the service is excellent. The delivery is always on time, and the food arrives hot and fresh.
When I go in to pick up my order, the customer service is professional and friendly. It‚Äôs clear they care about their customers. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for great food and reliable service in the neighborhood!
Trash from the moment they answered the phone

They are the worst with taking order.
They send wrong orders and don‚Äôt take accountability with their mistakes.
They do not realize it‚Äôs the neighborhood customers keeping their business going!
Food could be better too not all that great
Workers are nasty & rude!!!
Excellent service, delicious food.
very cluttered and mesy,person who took my order got it wrong.
Great food very friendly service. Definitely recommend.
Love ordering here they know me very well lol and the delivery guy is very nice
Me colgaron y vivo a la vuelta me grit√≥
absolutely disgusting
Nice place to get Chinese food but needs more seats.
I ordered Lg Shrimp Lomein no Vegetable. Crispy French Fries with Sesame Chicken and Egg Roll. Fast Service, Food arrived Nice and Hot and taste Delicious. Thank You.

I always eat in this Chinese restaurant. It is in my neighborhood right around the corner but the quality of the food is average. Sometimes the food taste good and sometimes the food tastes terrible. Like tonight, I ordered chicken brocoli white rice with white sauce but I could not eat it because the sauce was watery and it did not taste good.
Ordered the Chicken Egg Foo Young Combination Platter with Egg Roll and Pork Fried Rice. It was cooked well and very tasty and a great portion for $10.
Excelente comida le hab√≠a dado 5 estrellas ahora le doy una,no se que paso antes me hac√≠an de libre ahora ya no quieren traer dicen que en mi √°rea ya no traen,
La comida est√° muy deliciosa, se las recomiendo
Excelente servicio y deliciosa comida üòãüòç‚Ä¶
Love them but they closed up early on a Wednesday @ 8:30 I'm starving now & screwed over üôÉ üò´‚Ä¶
Food is always amazing, have never had a problem with quality or a wrong order. They're so friendly & kind, with great customer skills. Prices & portions are very great here.
Great people and great food. Only the locals know
New to the area but I love this place. The food is excellent.
The worst service I ever had just deliver cold old food Fried chicken guess shrimp fried rice chicken with old before It was cook I swear my stomach hurt right now

Best Chinese food in the Bronx hands down..
Service is great they make your food with love... it took me back to a kid when my mom used to get me Chinese food on Fridays from the city near the world trade center..

The food was way better before ...I ordered a Shrimp lomein today and it was slimy and soggy the customer service specifically  the man that answers the phone is rude and the delieryman  man is unprofessional
Amazing

I have been going to this Chinese restaurant for about 10 years, now. Even though the owners have changed, the food is still one of the tastiest, in my opinion. And, it is clean. I never had any issues.
Complete waste of money just ordered a whole bunch of food and everything was horrible.. everything was re fried nothing fresh. Will never order from here again
Las mejores alitas de pollo üçó‚Ä¶

Clean,Nice employees, food is great quality, fast service
Best Chinese food on the block, and after going here for more than 30+ years they are  finally delivering. üôåüôåüôå‚Ä¶
Food is decent. Delivery guys is terrible. Extremely rude and unprofessional. Even after the delivery he texted me unprofessional messages

Still my favorite Chinese food spot in the area.  Tonight (Friday night) they were packed when I ordered, but the wait was worth it and though they had their hands full they maintained good costumer service.
I can't get enough!
Very polite to their customers.
The food tastes amazing, people there are kind too!
food is deliciousÔºÅ
very good

Pague por una orden de comida y me la dieron incompleta.
This place is down the block from me and they always get your order wrong. The food can be good but make sure you stay on top of your order.
Best chinese food ever! I won't go anywhere else!! They are very clean and great customer service. The food is AMAZING!! The only thing is they don't deliver :(
The food is amazing the service is just as good and i can not stress enough how amazing the food is.
Pretty good food here, and if customer service is important to you, this place is a winner.
it was one of the best Chinese Restaurant in the area, but the new owners dont have the same standards as the old ones and the food is lacking the pride and taste it once had
I have concern about their food hygiene because once  I  found hair on fried chicken wings. I told them, they will fix it.
I love their food here. It's always good. This is my spot lol
La comida no digamos tan buena, pero por hay, solo no por una las demas pagan el plato roto, no, el servicio es excelente, y el precio esencial para su bolsillo.
Delicious! My family and I have been eating there for the past 24 years!
Love their food and super nice staff!
Very kind people, great food
Very delicious food lovey and are recommended to everyone
